title: News Reporter
description: Seeking an experienced News Reporter to join our dynamic team. You will cover breaking news, conduct interviews, and produce compelling news stories for television and digital platforms.
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Journalism or related field
• 3+ years of reporting experience
• Fluency in Amharic and English
• Excellent communication skills
• Ability to work under pressure

title: Video Editor
description: Looking for a creative Video Editor to edit news packages, documentaries, and entertainment programs. Must have experience with Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.
requirements:
• 2+ years of video editing experience
• Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite
• Strong storytelling skills
• Attention to detail
• Portfolio required

title: Social Media Manager
description: Manage Abbay TV's social media presence across all platforms. Create engaging content, grow our audience, and analyze performance metrics.
requirements:
• 3+ years social media experience
• Expertise in Facebook, YouTube, Telegram
• Content creation skills
• Analytics and reporting
• Bilingual (Amharic/English)
